entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rigolet
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle changing to periods of rain mixed with snow this evening. Fog patches. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Snowfall amount 2 cm inland. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Rain at times mixed with snow in the morning. Fog patches. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Snowfall amount 2 cm inland. Wind north 20 km/h. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Low plus 1.
